Several years later…
-For real you had that kind of thought on that moment? I can’t stop laughing.
-Shut up dude, I'm still embarrassed to remember it, and it was a great relief that they moved out of that apartment after that. But that's how that stage of my life really ended.
-And for your brothers to disappear from your life for good. What a shit brothers indeed.
-I get you, man. But you can’t be against your own family. 
-If you look it like that, you may be right. They did really crazy things, but it doesn’t compare at all with the ones you had back then at college, right? Those girls were hot.
-Shut up, it was not really that crazy. 
-Have you ever knew something about your brothers and their whereabouts?
-If my parents ever talked about them, I never really paid attention to them. And I really don’t remember anything about what they were discussing. Whatever happened to them was never my concern.
-Ok dude, got to go. See you tomorrow at work.
-Hello? Yes honey, I’m on my way…

If you read Part one, then yes, the brothers despise the middle kid.

Examples from part one:


Younger brother on page 11 panels 1, 2, and 3

“And you are? My big bro Kido’s girlfriend?”
“Um, we’re his friends.”

“Uh-huh. That makes sense. It’d be a waste to have a girlfriend this cute for my bro.”

So younger brother does make fun of him it seems like.

And the older brother, page 26 panel 4, 5, and 6

“Alright. Sorry Yuu, but can you clean up for us?”

“Huh?”

“There’s no other choice. You understand, right?”

“Yeah…Okay.”

Seems the older one orders him around a lot.

So yeah. He is pushed around a lot.

I still don't understand why people get mad over shit like this considering that the intent is clear from the start: to make the reader suffer through the eyes of the helpless main character. The MC is never going to "man up" and tell those who humiliated him to fuck off, exact revenge on them, become indifferent to their existence, move on from his feelings for any of the girls he was infatuated with or some shit like that, no matter how much you imagine or desire it. This is not a "fukushuu" story. The MC exists in the world of the story for the sole purpose of having his feelings and dignity trampled on by other characters and feeling miserable about it.

It's Hentai. Hentai isn't that serious.  And while I do feel bad for MC, his misery is his own.  Like, I get being jealous of your bros and wanting to get laid.  I've been down that road myself.  But I grew up when I realize that noone owes me anything, and that sex ain't that serious. Get your shit together, focus on what you want, and the bitches will come.  But MC will be a virgin forever because he'd rather wallow in his own misery than be a chad and get pussy.

I actually respect Mashira's works because they at least try to tell a story with somewhat realistic characters, not all of their choices make sense, but I find them to be better pieces of story telling, compared to this which, like many others have said, I believe was written to just get more out what was already a completed story in the first chapter. This second part add only a little more to the story in the first 20 pages and the final 5 pages. We got the point after the first chapter, so this second part was quite unnecessary, and even if it was, it did not have to be over 80 pages to make a point. But yeah, the characters here literally are just 1 dimensional with their only roles being to ruin the MCs life as much as possible, nothing beyond that, thus making them less believable and overall just more ridiculous.

@Xhydrogen1 What I mean by Terasu MC levels of depravity, I mean by how the characters are written in this story like Terasu's with regards to how despicable and horrible they are, with no reason other than to humiliate the MC, not by depression level. I have read some of Mashira's works and even though I do not like them since NTR is not in my taste, I admit that he/she writes incredibly realistic and almost believable stories, thus making them even more depressing because the fall of the FMCs are actually a bit more believable and grounded in reality, with some levels of complexity, compared to this one where everyone just either hates or are apathetic towards the MC for no other reason than for the sake of the story to be as horrible as possible.

The sex and art are amazing but 82 pages and only the last few are relevant plot wise. Why do the brothers hate the MC so much? Part 1 clearly showed that one of the brothers didn't care about the girls until the other one convinced him. In this part when MC decided to move out, his brothers helped him by convincing the parents to accept his decision. So if the goal of the brothers was chucking and make MC inferior they wouldn't let him out, the only reason for it is because they dislike/hate him. Feels like this part is too focused on the couples and the last few pages soly exist to remind us it's an NTR work.

@RascalChotto I agree with @Celino MC need to take this as a lesson and move on because those 2 girls are just a friend because they in the same class not by going out and have fun. They didn't use him. It just that his brothers were the ones who made the first move on them. the Black hair girl realized that they disrespect him at his house without MC's concern. In the last few pages, I think MC was having a talk to her and told her it not a good idea to change her lifestyle. Even without her glass on. MC tells the Black-haired girl to go back to the way she was. She gets angry, tells MC that she likes the way she is now. She told him that " I realized that she did something is not worth his praise so she feels like that our own problem" and says it's none of his business, it just happens in the same roof. She then tells MC that she sorry for cause problems for him she'll avoid him from now on.

You know... I'm all about NTR because there is an inherent fun in it and my problem with most vanilla is that they are boooring. If they fuck like rabbits and on top of that they love each other then be sure I will fap to that vanilla shit but that is not the usual. So while I'm a fan of NTR genre the sex scenes in this work are soooooo boring that it ruins it for me. They aren't going all out ahegao fucking around the house or some fun shit. This is plain boring sex. 3/10

And the last pages with the black haired girl shows how absolutely depraved they became, considering her previous friendship with MC meant so little that him saying that she is a different person and that he would like for her to go back, she completely shrugs it off and according to what others said, says that she wants to stay away from him, and just says I'm happy the way I am, like for real girl? Happy just being an onahole for your "boyfriend" and his brother. Anyway, the author obviously purposefully made everyone just equally terrible so that we could feel the hopelessness and depression MC felt for the story sake, no need to try to reason any of it, ntr hentai logic, as it is always said.

Let's just be honest here that the writing is closer to Terasu MC levels of depravity because I see no reason for the brothers and even the girls to be so outwardly rude and disgusting towards him. They treat him like trash for no reason. Even if it is true that MC does need to be involved in the love lives of his friends or brothers, but you can't justly say that they aren't being ridiculous at this point of swinging in living room of the same home MC lives in, almost like purposefully his brothers are trying to tell him that he is nothing. The girls have absolutely 0 awareness as to where they have sex as long as they get dick, and even when the brothers have sex with them, it's just feels written across their faces the absolute malice they feel towards the MC as they screw the girls hard enough for him to hear.
